Text:
Now I'm just confused why this is 7.96GB and 1080p and DownTYU's torrent is 3.99GB and 1080p.

Who can explain this to me?
That is because this has been ripped by different people, this one is SECTOR7 and other one is johnderina.

So a different group rips it and the size is 2x larger but the quality remains the same? 
I'm really glad they rip but that difference doesn't seem right...

Depends on the ripper's mentality, what one opts for...
Size is nothing, compression is everything.
